question: <image 1> An object is placed at a distance of 1.5f from a converging lens of focal length f, as shown. What type of image is formed and what is its size relative to the object?Type/Size
description: The image shows a converging lens with a focal length labeled as \( f \). The object is placed at a distance of 1.5f from the lens. The diagram includes a horizontal line representing the optical axis, with markings indicating distances of \( f \), \( 2f \), and \( 3f \) on either side of the lens. The object is positioned between \( f \) and \( 2f \) on the left side of the lens.
